83786.summary: Some customers in the Jasper Place & Rio Terrace area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
83786.title: Oct 14 - Edmonton (Jasper Place & Rio Terrace) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
